text: --module TEXT [Prefix --m]      Option with module name. [Fixed argument: *package, *alias, *script]
--module TEXT [Prefix --m]      Option with module name. [Fixed argument: *package, *alias, *script]
--tag TEXT    [Prefix --t]      The 'tag' is intended to group the items within each module.
--value TEXT  [Prefix --i]      The 'value' is the name of the item inside a 'tag'.
